tt <- function(x) {
  if (knitr::is_latex_output()) {
    sprintf("\\texttt{%s}", as.character(x))
  } else if (knitr::is_html_output()) {
    sprintf("<tt>%s</tt>", as.character(x))
  } else {
    x
  }
}

## Retrieve Data from `r tt("AoC")`


```{r get-data, cache = FALSE, messages = FALSE}
session_cookie <- set_cookies(session = keyring::key_get("AoC-GitHub-Cookie"))
base_url <- paste0("https://adventofcode.com/", params$year, "/day/", params$task_nr)
puzzle <- GET(base_url,
              session_cookie) %>% 
  content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
  xml_find_all("///article") %>% 
  lapply(as.character)

parse_puzzle_data <- function(text_block = readClipboard()) {
  if (length(text_block) == 1L) {
    text_block <- text_block %>% 
      str_split("\n") %>% 
      extract2(1L) %>% 
      keep(nzchar)
  }
  sw_pos <- str_which(text_block, fixed("swap position"))
  sw_let <- str_which(text_block, fixed("swap letter"))
  rot_pos <- str_which(text_block, "rotate (left|right)")
  rot_let <- str_which(text_block, fixed("rotate based"))
  rev_pos <- str_which(text_block, fixed("reverse position"))
  move_pos <- str_which(text_block, fixed("move"))
  tibble(op = text_block) %>% 
    mutate(id = 1:n(), .before = op,
           call = case_when(
             id %in% c(sw_pos, sw_let) ~ "swap",
             id %in% c(rot_pos, rot_let) ~ "rotate",
             id %in% rev_pos ~ "reverse",
             id %in% move_pos ~ "move"
           ),
           type = case_when(
             id %in% sw_pos ~ "position",
             id %in% c(sw_let, rot_let) ~ "letter",
             id %in% rot_pos ~ str_extract(op, "left|right"),
             TRUE ~ NA_character_
           ),
           arg1 = case_when(
             id %in% c(sw_pos, rot_pos, rev_pos, move_pos) ~ str_extract(op, "\\d+"),
             id %in% c(sw_let, rot_let) ~ str_extract(op, "letter .") %>% 
               str_remove("letter ")
           ),
           arg2 = case_when(
             id %in% c(sw_pos, rev_pos, move_pos) ~ str_extract(op, "\\d+$"),
             id %in% sw_let ~ str_extract(op, "letter .$") %>% 
               str_remove("letter ")
             )
    )
}

puzzle_data <- local({
  GET(paste0(base_url, "/input"),
      session_cookie) %>% 
    content(encoding = "UTF-8") %>% 
    parse_puzzle_data()
})
```

# Puzzle Day `r params$task_nr`

## Part 1

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-a, echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
cat(puzzle[[1]])
```

### Solution

The solution is rather straght forward implement the instructions and apply them one by 
one.


```{r get-solution-1}
swap <- function(key, type, arg1, arg2) {
  if (type == "letter") {
    arg1 <- str_locate(key, arg1)[, "start"] - 1L
    arg2 <- str_locate(key, arg2)[, "start"] - 1L
  }
  arg1 <- as.integer(arg1)
  arg2 <- as.integer(arg2)
  x <- str_sub(key, arg1 + 1L, arg1 + 1L)
  y <- str_sub(key, arg2 + 1L, arg2 + 1L)
  str_sub(key, arg1 + 1L, arg1 + 1L) <- y
  str_sub(key, arg2 + 1L, arg2 + 1L) <- x
  key
}

rotate <- function(key, type, arg1, arg2) {
  if (type == "letter") {
    pos <- str_locate(key, arg1)[, "start"]
  }
}
```

## Part 2

### Description

```{r show-puzzle-b, echo = FALSE, results = "asis", eval = length(puzzle) > 1}
cat(puzzle[[2]])
```

### Solution

For the second part, we simply have to sum up the gaps between the merged intervals.

```{r get-solution-2}
count_gaps <- function(intervals) {
  gaps <- 0L
  for (i in 2:length(intervals)) {
    gaps <- gaps + intervals[[i]]["from"] - intervals[[i - 1L]]["to"] - 1L
  }
  gaps <- gaps + intervals[[1L]]["from"]
  gaps <- gaps + as.integer64(2L ^ 32L) - tail(intervals, 1L)[[1L]]["to"] - 1L
  gaps
} 
count_gaps(merged_intervals)
```
